message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM

This paper is likely to belong to the Computer Vision (cs.CV) and Natural Language Processing (cs.CL) sub-categories, as it deals with image and sentence matching and proposes a model that improves image representation by learning semantic concepts and organizing them in a correct semantic order. The use of a multi-regional multi-label CNN for predicting semantic concepts and a context-gated sentence generation scheme for semantic order learning also suggests that this paper could be relevant to the Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. Finally, the fact that the proposed model achieves state-of-the-art results on two public benchmark datasets indicates that this paper could also be relevant to the Multimedia (cs.MM) sub-category.
